attributes.action: Tell the Muslim community in the UK, that we won't change our foreign policy according to their every whim.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Muslim leaders/activists in the UK are trying to force a change in foreign policy that suits their ideology, by a process of thinly veiled blackmail. Their warnings that a change to foreign policy is a must if we want to prevent events such as 7/7, is nothing short of a threat of violence.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Tell the Muslim community in the UK, that we won't change our foreign policy according to their every whim."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11135.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NoDhimmi/
